'''''Other Hands'' 18''' is an issue of ''[[Other Hands]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]]''.

* '''Published:''' July [[1997]]

==Contents==
*Editorial: Summer of MERP - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Communications - Skass
*Frontlines - [[Chris Seeman]]
*Digital Hands - Fredrik Ekman
*The Knight Wives of Calenardhon - Jason Vester
*Playing the ponies: ideas for using horses in your Middle-earth campaign - Bernie Roessler
*Rastarin's Log - Bridget Buxton
*Product Review: Arnor: The Land - Jasna Martinovic
*Product Review: Arnor: The People - Gen Larson
*Product Review: Middle-earth: Dark Minions - Marco Antonio Blanco Navarrete
